name: Test RGB
description:
Test: RBG is a game that I worked on as the sole programmer of the game, with assistance from friends. While this game has a few bugs, I'm very proud of it as it was the first game I created in Unity without having any prior knowledge and doing research to learn how to program and to problem solve errors.

The game was created for a university assignment called FP345, which stood for "First Person: 3 mechanics, 4 rooms, 5 minutes".
